htsjdk.samtools.reference

Class FastaSequenceIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • htsjdk.samtools.reference.FastaSequenceIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<htsjdk.samtools.reference.FastaSequenceIndexEntry>

    public class FastaSequenceIndex
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<htsjdk.samtools.reference.FastaSequenceIndexEntry>
    Reads a fasta index file (.fai), as generated by `samtools faidx`.
